bundles.name: React + Supabase Expert
bundles.description: Expert agent for building React applications with Supabase backend
bundles.longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a React + Supabase expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for building modern React applications with Supabase as your backend. Includes best practices for authentication, real-time subscriptions, database queries, and React component patterns. Perfect for full-stack developers building scalable web applications.

examples.title: Create Authentication Flow
examples.description: Build a complete user authentication system with email/password and social providers
examples.prompt: Help me create a React authentication flow with Supabase that includes email/password login, Google OAuth, and protected routes

examples.title: Real-time Data Subscription
examples.description: Implement real-time data updates using Supabase subscriptions
examples.prompt: Show me how to set up real-time subscriptions in React to listen for database changes in my todos table

examples.title: Database CRUD Operations
examples.description: Create type-safe CRUD operations with React hooks
examples.prompt: Help me create custom React hooks for CRUD operations on my Supabase database with TypeScript types

bundles.name: API Documentation Wizard
bundles.description: Expert agent for creating comprehensive API documentation and OpenAPI specifications
bundles.longDescription: Transform your Kiro into an API documentation expert! This agent bundle helps you create clear, comprehensive API documentation following industry best practices. Includes guidance for OpenAPI/Swagger specs, REST API design patterns, authentication documentation, and interactive API examples. Perfect for backend developers and API designers who want to create developer-friendly documentation.

examples.title: Create OpenAPI Specification
examples.description: Generate a complete OpenAPI 3.0 specification for your REST API
examples.prompt: Help me create an OpenAPI 3.0 specification for a user management API with authentication, CRUD operations, and pagination

examples.title: Document Authentication Flow
examples.description: Create clear documentation for API authentication and authorization
examples.prompt: Document the OAuth 2.0 authentication flow for my API, including token refresh and error handling

examples.title: Generate API Examples
examples.description: Create comprehensive request/response examples for API endpoints
examples.prompt: Generate example requests and responses for my REST API endpoints with different scenarios including success, validation errors, and authentication failures

bundles.name: Test-Driven Development Coach
bundles.description: Expert agent for practicing test-driven development with comprehensive testing strategies
bundles.longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a TDD expert! This agent bundle guides you through test-driven development practices, helping you write tests first and build robust, well-tested code. Includes guidance on unit testing, integration testing, test organization, mocking strategies, and property-based testing. Perfect for developers who want to improve code quality and adopt TDD practices.

examples.title: Write Unit Tests First
examples.description: Create comprehensive unit tests before implementing functionality
examples.prompt: Help me write unit tests for a user authentication function that validates email and password, then implement the function to pass the tests

examples.title: Create Integration Tests
examples.description: Build integration tests for API endpoints
examples.prompt: Write integration tests for my REST API user endpoints (create, read, update, delete) with proper setup and teardown

examples.title: Implement Property-Based Tests
examples.description: Use property-based testing for comprehensive coverage
examples.prompt: Create property-based tests for my sorting algorithm that verify it works correctly for any input array
